body.p: Nabuninuaihsus is a Neo-Assyrian cuneiform font developed by Robin Leroy; it is Oracc's recommended font for Neo-Assyian.
The font is the original work of Robin Leroy and is maintained at the GitHub repository https://github.com/eggrobin/Nabuninuaihsus.
Nabuninuaihsus is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
The font is downloadable from the GitHub repository https://github.com/eggrobin/Nabuninuaihsus.
In Oracc projects the font is selected with the CSS class ofs-nni.
